title: lol screensaver
body: I really don't know how to access the league screensavers does anyone hav any tips on how to access it?{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sorry for a delayed response.

You need to open your Windows Screensaver settings, select League of Legends and then click the settings button to the right.

http://puu.sh/o9iu1/fc249624f8.png
